name: Thomas Lettieri
title: Software Engineer
professionalSummary: Highly experienced, intellectually curious software engineer with 6+ years in the technology industry. My work spans a wide array of technologies with an emphasis on full stack development. I have worked on products in various stages of the development lifecycle from design to maintenance.
missionStatement: I strive to build modular code to effectively streamline software development, contribute to interesting projects, and give back to the community wherever possible.
